description: This application was really useful for me. As a juggler, I used it to learn siteswaps, to discover and learn patterns that I did not previously know, and to analyze what I was doing wrong with some tricks I've been working on for some time. Jack Boyce, I owe you a bear sir!
To make it excellent, the juggling objects needs to be of different colors and the arm sticks needs to be replaced with plates.
